title: Ticket #5231: "CCBListener: registered with CCB server" log message lacks newline
description:
/src/ccb/ccb_listener.cpp line 400ish in CCBListener::HandleCCBRegistrationReply these lines needs a newline at the end of the dprintf: 
    dprintf(D_ALWAYS,
            "CCBListener: registered with CCB server %s as ccbid %s",
            m_ccb_address.Value(),
            m_ccbid.Value() );
remarks:
2015-Aug-24 14:55:01 by adesmet:
Patch for signoff purposes. 

diff --git a/src/ccb/ccb_listener.cpp b/src/ccb/ccb_listener.cpp
index 9e4bf38..9992f35 100644
--- a/src/ccb/ccb_listener.cpp
+++ b/src/ccb/ccb_listener.cpp
@@ -397,7 +397,7 @@ CCBListener::HandleCCBRegistrationReply( ClassAd &msg )
    }
    msg.LookupString(ATTR_CLAIM_ID,m_reconnect_cookie);
    dprintf(D_ALWAYS,
-           "CCBListener: registered with CCB server %s as ccbid %s",
+           "CCBListener: registered with CCB server %s as ccbid %s\n",
            m_ccb_address.Value(),
            m_ccbid.Value() );

2015-Aug-24 15:03:58 by tlmiller:
Code Review

Looks good to me. ;)

2015-Aug-24 15:08:49 by adesmet:
No documentation, this is a typo fix for a log message.
check_ins: 2015-Aug-24 15:05   Check-in [45656]: Add missing newline on dprintf #5231 (By Alan De Smet )
creator: adesmet
